Description: Ostracon, section (two fragments joined) of the shoulder of a brown pottery ribbed and ridged vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the interior is spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and one red-painted character.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394114) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394114)
